text: Viśva sinhāsanavannu hottiruvavaru mattu adara sutta iruvavaru (malak‌gaḷu) tam'ma oḍeyanannu praśansisuttā avara pāvitravannu japisuttiruttāre. Avaru avanalli nambike iṭṭiruttāre mattu viśvāsigaḷa paravāgi kṣameyācisuttiruttāre; ‘‘nam'moḍeyā, ninna kr̥pe hāgū jñānavu ellavannū āvarisikoṇḍide. Paścāttāpa paḍuvavarannu hāgū ninna mārgavannu anusarisuvavarannu kṣamisibiḍu mattu avarannu narakada śikṣeyinda rakṣisu’’
